error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to Bluetooth adapter

data.device: Bluetooth local adapter name. Run 'hcitool' in a terminal to find out
data.devices: Comma-separated list of BRC1H Bluetooth addresses
data.discovery: Attempt to discover the devices. They must not be connected to a mobile app
data.force_update: Force disconnect from BRC1H device before start (recommended)

user.description:
Enter the Bluetooth MAC addresses of your BRC1H thermostats. Please make sure you have previously paired them with this instance as it requires human intervention:

1. Forget bluetooth connection on BRC1H
2. bluetoothctl scan on
3. bluetoochctl scan off
4. bluetoothctl pair [BRC1H MAC]
5. Confirm when prompted
6. Confirm connection on BRC1H
user.title: Configure Daikin Madoka
